Obsidian Black Metallic exterior, White interior + Dark Ash Wood decor.  Fully stock other than light tint all around, and the MODEL S + P100D lettering removed from hatch for a cleaner look (everything available for re-application). - Mileage 85k - Clean title and status - 2nd owner, purchased as Tesla Certified Pre-Owned - No accidents. Very slight scuff mark on bumper corner, not noticeable unless you are looking for it - Fully loaded: Premium Connectivity, Sub-Zero Weather, Full Self Driving ($12k option), Ultra HiFi Sound, Power and Lighting package - Ludicrous + performance 2.28s 0-60  - Carbon fiber spoiler - All glass panoramic roof - 2 sets of OEM turbine rims (21" spare set + 19" currently mounted) - No curb rash on rims, 9/10 condition - Daily charge ~260 miles at 90% charge and ~290-295 miles with full charge - Clean, non-smoker, garage kept - Clean title, no liens - Drive unit and battery still under warranty until April 2025 No issues... only looking to sell so I can upgrade to a newer model.   SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY!  - Local, in person bank transaction will be required - Price is firm - All scammers will be reported!

name: DT: 10K-MILE 2020 PORSCHE TAYCAN TURBO S
seller_notes: QR Code Link to This Post PCARMARKET is proud to present this 2020 PORSCHE TAYCAN TURBO S for sale! The pinnacle of Porsche’s all-electric Taycan model range, the Turbo S offers an output of 750 HP from electric motors on each axle as well as an adaptive air suspension, the Sport Chrono Package, and ceramic brakes as standard equipment. This launch-year example comes finished in Volcano Grey Metallic over a Black and Slate Grey Race-Tex interior and is optioned with the Premium Package, Mobile Charger Connect, Porsche Intelligent Range Manager, and Porsche Dynamic Chassis Control Sport (PDCC Sport). Dealer maintained and cared for by one owner, this Taycan Turbo S is now being offered by its seller out of Michigan while showing under 10k miles on the odometer and covered under the balance of its original factory warranty. For more information on this vehicle or to see our whole catalog of vehicles, visit the link below: www.pcarmarket.com
